Warning:

 - Do not create too many campaigns for one video, YT will not count many views from IP in very short time.
- Video length must be at least 45 seconds.
- YT needs 72 hours to update views from third party apps.

So please wait at least 72 hour to see your views updated on YT app. Use YT Studio to check view in real time.
You will be charged $2.32 + tax automatically every month until you cancel. Cancel anytime in Subscription on Google Play.
Billing starts at the end of 3 days free trial. You will be charges $5.89 + tax automatically every 3 months until you cancel. Cancel anytime in Subscription on Google Play.

Hello blank fragment

First, You need to collect the coin by subscribe other channel or make a purchase. when enough coin, You can create campaign to promote your channel: in Campaign tab -> add button -> select your channel and make order number of subscriber you want
Open YT app -> profile icon -> My Channel -> More button ->Share-> Copy link
No. As it is against YT terms and condition. All Subscriber is real user. It is very safe with your Channel
Sometime user subscribe your channel then unsubscribe or their account have been removed, so real subscriber maybe less than your order.

You can not do it. If other people subscribe then unsubscribe, real subscriber of your channel will be reduce. So we do not allow you unsubscribe the channel you subscribed on this app. If you unsubscribe your channel you subscribed on this app, We will block your account
If you subscribed this channel but can not get coin, please check if your account logged in this app and YT app is same or not.
